articles.title: CDC and WHO offer conflicting advice on masks. An expert tells us why. - MSN Money
articles.description: The WHO issued new guidance that may seem confusing to Americans, who have been advised by the CDC, to wear cloth face masks in public to slow COVID-19's spread.
